product_name: DeFeet Aireator Sugar Skull Bike Socks - Men's
long_description: Celebrate "Dia de los Muertos" anytime you ride with the men's DeFeet Aireator Sugar Skull Bike Socks. Their CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) recycled fibers wick and breathe like no others. Ventilating mesh weave across the top of the foot gives the Aireator socks their name. CoolMax EcoMade fibers are made from recycled plastic bottles. High cuff styling lets you wear the DeFeet Aireator Sugar Skull Bike Socks with street clothes, too.
short_description: Celebrate "Dia de los Muertos" anytime you ride with the men's DeFeet Aireator Sugar Skull Bike Socks. Their CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) recycled fibers wick and breathe like no others.
